class.name: EventDispatcher
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: An extendable object that fires custom events.
class.property: Holds an array of event listeners

method.name: removeListener
method.description: Allows for removal of event delegation.

method.name: dispatch
method.description: Dispatches / Fires an event for event delegation.

method.name: hasListener
method.description: Checks to see if the given listener exists.
method.param: the object to use as the context of the method
